name: Can You Escape The Color Line Switch? 2
name_original: Can You Escape The Color Line Switch? 2
description:
—————It’s too typical and difficult as you need to try harder to survive longer—————


“Can You Escape The Color Line Switch? 2” is one of the best casual game that you can try once agin with a new fresh look game style. A fresh take on the classic casual gameplay that would relieve your stress.

All you need to do is to follow the instructions and avoid the color blocks in the mid way.

How to play:

• Swipe to move
• Avoid the blocks as per the instructions


Hold on and see how much you can score.

Don't forget to log into Game Centre to see where you rank in the charts.


Cool gameplay for your casual hours!!
